title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is offered a chance to erase his criminal past if he can successfully perform inception: planting an idea into someone's subconscious.

title: Spirited Away
description: A young girl enters a mysterious spirit world and must find a way to free herself and her parents from a witch's curse.

title: La La Land
description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household and infiltrate their lives with unexpected consequences.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
